title: What's the second most expensive laptop brand after Apple? - Quora

response.answer_text: It’s hard to tell which ‘brand’ are the 2nd expensive after apple. afaik without including some fancy things like gold or fashion branded, it could be Razer or maybe Alienware. cmiiw
It is probably Razer. They only make a few models, just like Apple. In fact their model lineup is very similar, save the higher end ones are gaming machines and all run Windows.
